content.prompt: The Forbidden City and the Palace at Versailles express similar meaning in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Both contain important religious structures to convey the rulers’ spiritual orientation.
Both include elaborate gardens to convey the rulers’ appreciation for the beauty of the natural world.
Both use gates and doorways to convey differences in the status of people who enter the complexes.
Both were planned and laid out along symbolic axes that convey the rulers’ absolute authority.

unit.text: 8: South, East, and Southeast Asia, 300 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 8.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in South, East, and Southeast Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain how two or more works of art are similar and/or different in how they convey meaning.
